verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> after <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> show <S%H7200>thyself<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H256>Ahab;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to show <S%H7200>himself<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H256>Ahab.<s%> And there was a <S%H2389>sore<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was the <S%H5921>governor<s%> of his <S%H1004>house.<s%> (Now <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H1961>feared<s%> <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> greatly: <S%H3966><s%>

For it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, when <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H2244>hid<s%> them by <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376><s%> in a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H3557>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water.)<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> into the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4599>fountains<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5158>brooks:<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> we may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2682>grass<s%> to save the horses and mules <S%H2421>alive,<s%> <S%H5483><s%> <S%H6505><s%> that we <S%H3772>lose<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> all the <S%H4480>beasts.<s%> <S%H929><s%>

So they <S%H2505>divided<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> between them to <S%H5674>pass<s%> throughout it: <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H905>himself,<s%> and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H905>himself.<s%>

And as <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H7122>met<s%> him: and he <S%H5234>knew<s%> him, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Art <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H452>Elijah?<s%>
And he <S%H559>answered<s%> him, <S%H589>I<s%> am: <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> thy <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> is here.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> wouldest <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> me?

As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> or <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> thee: and when they <S%H559>said,<s%> He is <S%H369>not<s%> there; he took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> and <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> thee <S%H3808>not.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H559>sayest,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> thy <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> is here.

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as soon as <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> thee, that the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> thee <S%H5921>whither<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> and so when I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> and he <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> thee, he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> me: but I thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from my <S%H4480>youth.<s%> <S%H5271><s%>

Was it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> when <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> how I <S%H2244>hid<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the LORD's <S%H4480>prophets<s%> <S%H5030><s%> <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H2572><s%> <S%H376><s%> in a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H3557>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water?<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H559>sayest,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> thy <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> is here: and he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> me.

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> I will <S%H3588>surely<s%> show <S%H7200>myself<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H3117>today.<s%>
So <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him: and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H452>Elijah.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> that <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Art <S%H859>thou<s%> he <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H5916>troubleth<s%> <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5916>troubled<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> in that ye have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and thou hast <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H1168>Baalim.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H7971>send,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H842>groves<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> which <S%H398>eat<s%> at <S%H348>Jezebel's<s%> <S%H7979>table.<s%>

So <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and gathered the prophets <S%H6908>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5030><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> <S%H6452>halt<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5921>between<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5587>opinions?<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> him: but <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> then <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> him. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H1697>word.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> even I <S%H905>only,<s%> <S%H3498>remain<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> but <S%H1168>Baal's<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Let them therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks;<s%> and let them <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for themselves, and cut it in <S%H5408>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> under: and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6213>dress<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> under:

And <S%H7121>call<s%> ye on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6030>answereth<s%> by <S%H784>fire,<s%> let <S%H1931>him<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H2896>well<s%> <S%H1697>spoken.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H977>Choose<s%> you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for yourselves, and <S%H6213>dress<s%> it <S%H7223>first;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are <S%H7227>many;<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>gods,<s%> but <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> under.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> them, and they <S%H6213>dressed<s%> it, and <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> from <S%H4480>morning<s%> <S%H1242><s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6672>noon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> O <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> us. But there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> any that <S%H6030>answered.<s%> And they <S%H6452>leaped<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H6213>made.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H2048>mocked<s%> them, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Cry<s%> <S%H6963>aloud:<s%> <S%H1419><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H430>god;<s%> <S%H3588>either<s%> he is <S%H7879>talking,<s%> <S%H3588>or<s%> he is <S%H7873>pursuing,<s%> <S%H3588>or<s%> he is in a <S%H1870>journey,<s%> or <S%H194>peradventure<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3463>sleepeth,<s%> and must be <S%H3364>awaked.<s%>

And they <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H6963>aloud,<s%> <S%H1419><s%> and cut <S%H1413>themselves<s%> after their <S%H4941>manner<s%> with <S%H2719>knives<s%> and <S%H7420>lancets,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> gushed <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H6672>midday<s%> was <S%H5674>past,<s%> and they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the time of the <S%H5927>offering<s%> of the evening <S%H4503>sacrifice,<s%> that there was <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> any to <S%H6030>answer,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> any that <S%H7182>regarded.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> Come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me. And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him. And he <S%H7495>repaired<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that was broken <S%H2040>down.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy name: <S%H8034><s%>

And <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H8585>trench<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> as great as would <S%H1004>contain<s%> two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

And he <S%H6186>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> in order, and <S%H5408>cut<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> in pieces, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> him <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4390>Fill<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3537>barrels<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Do it the second <S%H8138>time.<s%> And they did it the second <S%H8138>time.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Do it the third <S%H8027>time.<s%> And they did it the third <S%H8027>time.<s%>
And the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H1980>ran<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and he <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8585>trench<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the time of the <S%H5927>offering<s%> of the evening <S%H4503>sacrifice,<s%> that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> came <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let it be <S%H3045>known<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that <S%H589>I<s%> am thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> at thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>

Hear <S%H6030><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and that <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> back <S%H322>again.<s%>

Then the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5307>fell,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice,<s%> and the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and the <S%H68>stones,<s%> and the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and licked <S%H3897>up<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H8585>trench.<s%>
